com.epimorphics.lda.sources
Interface Source

All Known Implementing Classes:
CombinedSource, HereSource, LocalSource, SparqlSource, TDBSource
public interface Source

Abstraction of the data endpoint to be queried. Can be a remote SPARQL service, a restful endpoint or some local model

Version:
$Revision: $
Author:
Dave Reynolds

          The callback object used for SELECTs.

Method Detail

toString

String toString()
Return a name for this source, used for error reporting

Overrides:
toString in class Object

addMetadata

void addMetadata(com.hp.hpl.jena.rdf.model.Resource meta)
Add metdata describing this source to a metdata model

executeDescribe

com.hp.hpl.jena.rdf.model.Model executeDescribe(com.hp.hpl.jena.query.Query q)
Do a DESCRIBE. Answer the resulting model. Puts a read lock around the access to the underlying data.

executeConstruct

com.hp.hpl.jena.rdf.model.Model executeConstruct(com.hp.hpl.jena.query.Query q)
Do a CONSTRUCT. Answer the resulting model. Puts a read lock around the access to the underlying data.

executeSelect

void executeSelect(com.hp.hpl.jena.query.Query q,
                   Source.ResultSetConsumer c)
Do a SELECT. First run c.setup on the QueryExecution object created from the query. Then run c.consume on the ResultSet of the select. Puts a read lock around the access to the underlying data.

supportsNestedSelect

boolean supportsNestedSelect()
Answer TRUE iff this source supports nested SELECT queries (as specified by SPARQL 1.1).
